text: Yalli nummah xiibiteh Samuud deqsitta kedoh ken toobokoyta Nabii Saalic Yalla inkittoysaay, dubuk kaa uqbuda iyyaanamal ken fanah kaa rubne axcuk, edde-luk Nabii Saalic ken fanah yemeeteeh Yalla inkittoysa keenik iyye waqdi usun too waqdi namma buttay ittawayta yekken yeemene maraa kee koroosite marah anuk
